titles.title: Shine Thou Upon Us Lord (familiar easy tune)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shine Thou upon us Lord True light of men today And through the written Word Thy very self display That so from hearts which burn With gazing on Thy face Thy little ones may learn The wonders of Thy grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Breathe Thou upon us Lord Thy Spirit's living flame That so with one accord Our lips may tell Thy name Give Thou the hearing ear Fix Thou the wand'ring thought That those we teach may hear The great things Thou hast wrought{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Speak Thou for us O Lord In all we say of Thee According to Thy Word Let all our teaching be That so Thy lambs may know Their own true Shepherd's voice Where'er He leads them go And in His love rejoice{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Live Thou within us Lord Thy mind and will be ours Be Thou beloved adored And served with all our powers That so our lives may teach Thy children what Thou art And plead by more than speech For Thee with ev'ry heart{/lang-eng}
